ai-patthana20.9:0.2_0: the immediately Factors of the Dhamma had the Sangha, namely, an outcaste.
ai-patthana20.9:1.1_0: ‘This is not the cause, this is the reason why the Teaching arises,
ai-patthana20.9:2.1_0: A teaching doesn’t give rise to a refuge ... three conditions ...
ai-patthana20.9:3.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge, nor for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana20.9:4.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana20.9:5.1_0: go for refuge to the Dhamma, or to the root of a refuge.
ai-patthana20.9:5.1_1: One does not give rise to a refuge because of conscious cause or reason.

ai-patthana20.9:6.1_0: not for the sake of establishing, or for two reasons,
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_1: You’re not reborn in a good place ...
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_3: When they were bathing, they were bathing naked in a definitive ...
ai-patthana20.9:6.1_5: it seems to us when you have excellence
ai-patthana20.9:7.1_0: or even a canopy covered in the same way.
ai-patthana20.9:8.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_0: Not how the Dhamma is a condition for the refuge,
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_1: Also the Teaching is not a condition for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana20.9:9.1_2: Also, refuge is the cause and condition for the sake of refuge, and for the sake of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana20.9:10.1_0: One does not have a condition for the taking particular state as object;
ai-patthana20.9:10.1_1: no ruler of the teaching is a condition for the right way,
ai-patthana20.9:11.1_0: no teaching is a condition for the refuge by way of death,
ai-patthana20.9:11.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana20.9:12.1_1: Two on the fifth day, when there is a person producing condition for four months, after the result of good deeds, and for the result of in the rolling of the faculties, five powers, three faculties, four ways, five powers, and one who lives in dependence on the paths of the faculties. ...
ai-patthana20.9:12.1_2: There are seven hundred and seventy migrations
ai-patthana20.9:13.1_0: Not by way of refuge, (of the teaching) is a condition for the object condition for the continuation condition.
